org.linqs.psl.model.predicate.model

Class SupportingModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.model.predicate.model.SupportingModel

  • public abstract class SupportingModel
extends Object
    A model that is used by a ModelPredicate.

        protected int[] entityArgumentIndexes
        The indexes of this predicate that compose the entity ID.

        protected int[] labelArgumentIndexes
        The indexes of this predicate that compose the label ID.

      • entityIndexMapping

        protected Map<String,Integer> entityIndexMapping
        Map the ID for an entity to an index. Note that multiple atoms can have the same entity ID.

      • labelIndexMapping

        protected Map<String,Integer> labelIndexMapping
        Map the ID for a label to its index in the output layer.

      • numFeatures

        protected int numFeatures

      • manualLabels

        protected float[][] manualLabels
        Labels manually set by the reasoner to use for fitting. [entities x labels]

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public abstract void load(Map<String,String> config,
                          String relativeDir)
        Load the model from some configuration (that may include paths).

      • getValue

        public abstract float getValue(RandomVariableAtom atom,
                               int entityIndex,
                               int labelIndex)
        Get the value for the specified atom. The atom is specified by both the actual atom, or the entity/label index.

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Run the model and store the result internally.

      • fit

        public abstract void fit()
        Fit the model using values set through setLabel().

      • getValue

        public float getValue(RandomVariableAtom atom)

      • resetLabels

        public void resetLabels()

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(RandomVariableAtom atom,
                     float labelValue)

      • loadLabels

        protected void loadLabels(String path)
        Load the file that defines the order that labels will appear. The mapping will be loaded directly into |labelIndexMapping|. Although not invoked directly by this class, this is made available to supporting models.

      • loadFeatures

        protected float[][] loadFeatures(String path)
        Load the file that maps entities to features. The mapping of entity to index will be placed in |entityIndexMapping|, |numFeatures| will be set, and the actual features are returned. Although not invoked directly by this class, this is made available to supporting models.

      • getAtomIndexes

        protected SupportingModel.AtomIndexes getAtomIndexes(RandomVariableAtom atom)

      • getEntityIndex

        protected int getEntityIndex(RandomVariableAtom atom)

      • getLabelIndex

        protected int getLabelIndex(RandomVariableAtom atom)

      • getAtomIdentifier

        protected String getAtomIdentifier(String[] stringArgs,
                                   int[] argumentIndexes)

      • getAtomIdentifier

        protected String getAtomIdentifier(RandomVariableAtom atom,
                                   int[] argumentIndexes)

      • makePath

        protected static String makePath(String relativeDir,
                                 String basePath)
        Construct a path to the given file relative to the data file. If the given path is absolute, then don't change it.
